title: Convert an Nx Angular project from TSLint to ESLint
description: NOTE: Does not work in the --dry-run mode

examples.description: Convert the Nx Angular project `myapp` from TSLint to ESLint

project.description: The name of the project to convert.
project.x-prompt: Which project would you like to convert from TSLint to ESLint?

removeTSLintIfNoMoreTSLintTargets.description: If this conversion leaves no more TSLint usage in the workspace, it will remove TSLint and related dependencies and configuration
removeTSLintIfNoMoreTSLintTargets.x-prompt: Would you like to remove TSLint and its related config if there are no TSLint targets remaining after this conversion?
